DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine : - The efficacy MRE score predictor HCC recurrence within 2 year RFA treatment - The efficacy indicator ( MRE score , non-invasive serum marker ) compare gold-standard histology score predict hepatic fibrosis
DOC.brief_title: Magnetic Resonance Elastography ( MRE ) Predictor HCC Recurrence After Radiofrequency Ablation ( RFA )
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate whether MRE score reflect hepatic fibrosis predict recurrence HCC within 2 year RFA treatment - Local recurrence/intrahepatic distant recurrence - Multivariable analysis include several related factor find whether MRE score independent predictor HCC recurrence even adjust factor ( etiology liver disease , size HCC , vessel invasion , HBsAg titer , etc . ) To find efficacy indicator ( MRE score , non-invasive serum marker ) compare gold-standard histology score predict hepatic fibrosis .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed single hypervascular hepatocellular carcinoma initially AJCC stage I HCC ChildPugh class A Planning radiofrequency ablation HCC Voluntary agreement study Decreased kidney function ( GFR < 70 mL/min/kg ) Contraindication MRI ( pacemaker , defibrillator ) Contrast medium hypersensitivity Other primary malignancy Acute viral hepatitis Prior history liver transplantation Thrombosis splenic vein portal vein Patients enrol clinical trial within 4 week Other severe chronic disease psychiatric disease Pregnant milkfeeding woman Patients coagulopathy , high risk bleed liver biopsy Patients disagree participate study
